title: Boston Dynamics CEO Robert Playter steps down after 30 years at the company
description: Robert Playter announcd he is leaving Boston Dynamics after 30 years at the company in various roles, including six years as CEO.
content: Robert Playter announcd he is leaving Boston Dynamics after 30 years at the company in various roles, including six years as CEO.
